message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL 

This paper deals with inferring trust relations between social media users, which is a problem related to social networks and information retrieval. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.SOC (Social and Information Networks). The paper also proposes an approach that uses representation learning, which falls under the category of machine learning, specifically unsupervised learning. Hence, cs.SI (Machine Learning) is also a likely category. The paper also evaluates the proposed approach using F-score, which is a common evaluation metric in natural language processing and information retrieval, hence cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are also possible categories. Finally, the paper deals with binary classification, which is a common problem in machine learning, hence cs.LG (Learning) is also a possible category.
